raw_comment: We noticed that in the mountainous areas the leaves arrived last (May) because of the higher elevation causing colder temperatures. We wonder how accurate this graph really is. And we believe that the graph shows that spring evolves from the south moving upwards toward the north. A title for this graph may be " A timelapse of spring".
ace_sentences: We noticed that in mountainous areas the leaves arrived last in May.
The higher elevation caused colder temperatures.
We wonder how accurate this graph is.
We believe that this graph shows that spring evolves from the south.
We believe that spring moves upward toward the north.
A possible title for this graph is "A timelapse of spring".
